mapper.sql: t_house_decorate_plan . id , t_house_decorate_plan.decorate_style_name AS decorateStyleName, t_house_decorate_plan.allow_changed AS allowChanged, t_house_decorate_plan.color_style AS colorStyle, t_house_decorate_plan.total_budget AS totalBudget, t_house_decorate_plan.star, t_house_decorate_plan.cover,t_house_decorate_plan.merchant
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_decorate_plan.* FROM t_house_decorate_plan WHERE t_house_decorate_plan.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_decorate_plan.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_decorate_plan
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_decorate_plan.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_decorate_plan.decorate_style_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.decorateStyleName},'%')
AND t_house_decorate_plan.allow_changed LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.allowChanged},'%')
AND t_house_decorate_plan.color_style LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.colorStyle},'%')
AND t_house_decorate_plan.total_budget LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.totalBudget},'%')
AND t_house_decorate_plan.star LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.star},'%')
AND t_house_decorate_plan.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_decorate_plan.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}

SELECT t_product.* FROM t_house_decorate_plan JOIN t_house_decorate_plan_funiture ON t_house_decorate_plan.id = t_house_decorate_plan_funiture.decorate_plan_id JOIN t_product on t_house_decorate_plan_funiture.furniture_id = t_product.id WHERE t_house_decorate_plan.design_model_id = #{designModelId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM t_house_user_decorate_plan WHERE t_house_user_decorate_plan.decorate_plan_id = #{decoratePlanId} GROUP BY t_house_user_decorate_plan.user_id) AS t

SELECT SUM(t_product.price) FROM t_product JOIN t_house_decorate_plan_funiture ON t_house_decorate_plan_funiture.decorate_plan_id = #{decoratePlanId} AND t_house_decorate_plan_funiture.furniture_id = t_product.id WHERE t_house_decorate_plan_funiture.furniture_id = t_product.id
